pages.text: Prized for both its clinical and other uses, Miskatonic University is proud to introduce the most potent and safest $(item)Laudanum$() available on the market to date.$(br)This elixir, when consumed, has a nearly immediate sedative effect that has been proven to work for both common ailments to clinical $(l:miskatonicmysteries:mania)$(marked)Mania$() and madness.
